document_data.name: ''Phalar Aluve''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Phalar Aluve''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[longsword]] associated with the faith of [[Eilistraee]].

{{Quote|Though I have to leave you, I will dance forever in Eilistraee's light.|''The inscription of Phalar Aluve's blade.''}}
document_data.Description: ''Phalar Aluve'' was inscribed with a pattern that glowed gold when the sword was drawn. Part of the inscription featured a single line written in the [[drow language]].
document_data.Powers: It possessed a ''+1 enchantment'' and magically enhanced the owner's artistic performances.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the sword remained embedded in a stone outcropping in the [[Underdark]], near [[Ebonlake Grotto]].
